zh.title: 沙特阿拉伯麦加大清真寺被占领
美国国家安全委员会对伊朗军售丑闻曝光
欧洲安全与合作组织巴黎宪章签署
印度洋海啸灾难性后果初步显现
安吉拉·默克尔正式就任德国总理
拉脱维亚加入欧元区获欧盟批准
津巴布韦总统罗伯特·穆加贝辞职
奥密克戎变异株被世界卫生组织确认

en.title: Pakistan: US Embassy in Islamabad attacked and burned
MGM Grand Hotel fire in Las Vegas kills 85
U.S. Navy intelligence analyst Jonathan Pollard arrested for spying for Israel.
The CSCE Paris summit concludes, ending the Cold War.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average closes above 5,000 for the first time.
Halo 2 is released, becoming a major cultural phenomenon in gaming.
Coal mine explosion in Heilongjiang, China kills 108.
Robert Mugabe resigns as President of Zimbabwe after 37 years in power.
The FIFA World Cup begins in Qatar.
